pull.title: Remove sharp edge (uninit member) when using the compiler-generated ctor for BlockFilter
pull.body:
Remove sharp edge (uninitialised member `m_filter_type`) when using the compiler-generated constructor for `BlockFilter`.

Before (but after added test):

```
$ src/test/test_bitcoin -t blockfilter_tests/blockfilter_basic_test
Running 1 test case...
test/blockfilter_tests.cpp(118): error: in "blockfilter_tests/blockfilter_basic_test": check default_ctor_block_filter_1.GetFilterType() == default_ctor_block_filter_2.GetFilterType() has failed [ != ]

*** 1 failure is detected in the test module "Bitcoin Test Suite"
``` 

After:

```
$ src/test/test_bitcoin -t blockfilter_tests/blockfilter_basic_test
Running 1 test case...

*** No errors detected
```

events.body: Hmm, I think it'd be better to define an INVALID = 255 BlockFilterType and set it to that.

events.message: Remove sharp edge (uninitialized m_filter_type) when using the compiler-generated constructor for BlockFilter

events.body: @jimpo Thanks for reviewing. Adjusted accordingly. Please re-review :-)
